title: William's roast beef
ingredients: ['3 teaspoons grated fresh root ginger', '5 tbsp orange marmalade', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tbsp soy sauce', '2 tbsp dark brown soft sugar', '1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce', '1 tablespoon mustard powder', '250ml lager', '1 (3.5kg) piece rib of beef', '4 tbsp olive oil', 'freshly ground black pepper']
